additional_info:
4 got PPO ( 1 of them rejected offer)
CTC = ~40LPA (Not exactly 40) -> RSUs worth Rs 16L + 8L Insurance and other Benefits

13L Base + 1.5L JB + 1.25L Relocation 
+ 4L  Annual Incentive Compensation (Performace Based)
This is from the Code for Good for FTE
Took students through CTY program held on collaboration with CCBD (RR Campus Exclusive)
3 of the 4 were given the offer and all 3 accepted it
Benefits included such as free cab and stuff. Additional 1.25L for Relocation Bonus

Company asked for role preference
but shortlisted according to
business requirements
CTC given by the company is 7.64 while 10.64 is the money received post retention and joining bonus. So considered 10.64 as CTC with 7.64 as base

CTC: Total Earning Potential will be Base + Variable + Other benefits [Variable Pay - which depends on the individual’s performance, service line’s performance and the firm’s performance + Other Benefits (Gratuity & Insurance)]
There are other allowances that might be provided which is not part of the CTC. Only a few have been offered the itnernship
Hiring for internship only with PBC
10 inclusive of fixed + variable, Additional 1.5 JB
Internship with PBC. Internship duration - 6 months to 1 Yr
